duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and grow assigned distributor or OEM accounts through effective communication and time management practices.
Assist in developing opportunities and nurturing existing book of business by collaborating with key account managers.
Prepare and maintain business plans, sales forecasts, and activity cadence plans.
Monitors data, provides sales trend analysis, and identifies weaknesses in sales execution.
Supports and coordinates call cadence at key OEM/User customers and provides ad hoc reporting.
Drive lead qualification, quote qualification, and follow-up activities to drive opportunities and results.
Collaborate, communicate, and coordinate with internal teams, prepare and present commentary and analysis to support decision-making.
Serve as an advisor to sales leadership on performance/results and provide regularly scheduled reviews about distributor and OEM/user customer accounts.
